edit_size.label: Editing size:
edit_size.description: Current/initial size in pixels of the area selected for editing

generation_size.label: Generation size:
generation_size.description: Current/initial size in pixels used for AI image generation

tool_tab_bar.label: Tool tab bar:
tool_tab_bar.description: Toolbar where the tool tab is placed by default (TOP|BOTTOM|LEFT|RIGHT|LOWER or empty)

generation_tab_bar.label: Image generation tab bar:
generation_tab_bar.description: Toolbar where the image generation tab is placed by default (TOP|BOTTOM|LEFT|RIGHT|LOWER or empty)

controlnet_tab_bar.label: ControlNet tab bar:
controlnet_tab_bar.description: Toolbar where the ControlNet tab is placed by default (TOP|BOTTOM|LEFT|RIGHT|LOWER or empty)

text_tool_params.label: Text tool parameters:
text_tool_params.description: Last text tool font and settings

last_active_tool.label: Last active tool:
last_active_tool.description: Label of the last active tool, to restore after restart

recent_tools.label: Recent tools:
recent_tools.description: Cached list of recent active tools

last_nav_panel_tool.label: Last navigation panel tool:
last_nav_panel_tool.description: Label of the last active tool in the navigation panel, to restore after restart

fill_threshold.label: Color threshold:
fill_threshold.description: Sets how closely colors need to match the clicked color to be selected. 0.0 only changes exact matching colors, higher values are more permissive.

fill_tool_brush_pattern.label: Pattern:
fill_tool_brush_pattern.description: Fill tool Qt brush style to apply

sample_merged.label: Sample Merged
sample_merged.description: If checked, fill based on the entire image contents, not just the current layer

color_select_mode.label: Select all by color
color_select_mode.description: If checked, ignore boundaries and select all content within the color threshold

paint_selection_only.label: Paint selection only
paint_selection_only.description: If checked, only paint within the selection bounds

paint_tool_brush_size.label: Size:
paint_tool_brush_size.description: Current/initial brush size (in pixels) for the MyPaint brush tool.

selection_brush_size.label: Size:
selection_brush_size.description: Current/initial brush size (in pixels) for the selection tool.

draw_tool_brush_size.label: Size:
draw_tool_brush_size.description: Current/initial brush size (in pixels) for the draw tool.

draw_tool_pressure_size.label: Pen pressure=size:
draw_tool_pressure_size.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects draw tool brush size.

draw_tool_pressure_opacity.label: Pen pressure=opacity:
draw_tool_pressure_opacity.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects draw tool brush opacity.

draw_tool_pressure_hardness.label: Pen pressure=hardness:
draw_tool_pressure_hardness.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects draw tool brush hardness.

draw_tool_brush_pattern.label: Pattern:
draw_tool_brush_pattern.description: Draw tool Qt brush style to apply

eraser_tool_size.label: Eraser size:
eraser_tool_size.description: Current/initial brush size (in pixels) for the eraser tool.

eraser_tool_pressure_size.label: Pen pressure=size:
eraser_tool_pressure_size.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects draw tool brush size.

eraser_tool_pressure_opacity.label: Pen pressure=opacity:
eraser_tool_pressure_opacity.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects draw tool brush opacity.

eraser_tool_pressure_hardness.label: Pen pressure=hardness:
eraser_tool_pressure_hardness.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects draw tool brush hardness.

filter_tool_brush_size.label: Size:
filter_tool_brush_size.description: Current/initial brush size (in pixels) for the filter tool.

filter_tool_pressure_size.label: Pen pressure=size:
filter_tool_pressure_size.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects filter tool brush size.

filter_tool_pressure_opacity.label: Pen pressure=opacity:
filter_tool_pressure_opacity.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects filter tool brush opacity.

filter_tool_pressure_hardness.label: Pen pressure=hardness:
filter_tool_pressure_hardness.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects filter tool brush hardness.

smudge_tool_brush_size.label: Size:
smudge_tool_brush_size.description: Current/initial brush size (in pixels) for the smudge tool.

smudge_tool_pressure_size.label: Pen pressure=size:
smudge_tool_pressure_size.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects smudge tool brush size.

smudge_tool_pressure_opacity.label: Pen pressure=opacity:
smudge_tool_pressure_opacity.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects smudge tool brush opacity.

smudge_tool_pressure_hardness.label: Pen pressure=hardness:
smudge_tool_pressure_hardness.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects smudge tool brush hardness.

clone_stamp_tool_brush_size.label: Size:
clone_stamp_tool_brush_size.description: Current/initial brush size (in pixels) for the clone stamp tool.

clone_stamp_tool_pressure_size.label: Pen pressure=size:
clone_stamp_tool_pressure_size.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects clone stamp tool brush size.

clone_stamp_tool_pressure_opacity.label: Pen pressure=opacity:
clone_stamp_tool_pressure_opacity.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects clone stamp tool brush opacity.

clone_stamp_tool_pressure_hardness.label: Pen pressure=hardness:
clone_stamp_tool_pressure_hardness.description: Drawing tablet pen pressure affects clone stamp tool brush hardness.

shape_tool_star_inner_point_fraction.label: Inner radius fraction:
shape_tool_star_inner_point_fraction.description: Distance from the center to inner star points, as a fraction of the distance to the outer points

shape_tool_dash_pattern.label: Dash pattern:
shape_tool_dash_pattern.description: Dash length followed by space length, for any number of dash/space pairs.

saved_main_window_pos.label: Saved main window placement
saved_main_window_pos.description: display, position, and size where the main window last was.

saved_layer_window_pos.label: Saved layer window placement
saved_layer_window_pos.description: display, position, and size where the layer window last was.

saved_navigation_window_pos.label: Saved navigation window placement
saved_navigation_window_pos.description: display, position, and size where the navigation window was last.

prompt.label: Prompt:
prompt.description: Description that generated images should match.

negative_prompt.label: Negative prompt:
negative_prompt.description: Description that generated images should not match.

guidance_scale.label: Guidance scale:
guidance_scale.description: Controls how strongly the prompt and negative prompt are applied.

batch_size.label: Batch size:
batch_size.description: Number of image options to simultaneously create in a single image editing operation.

batch_count.label: Batch count:
batch_count.description: Number of image batches to create in a single image editing operation. Increasing this value doesn't require additional memory, but it slows down image editing more than increasing the batch size does.

edit_mode.label: Edit mode:
edit_mode.description: Stable-Diffusion image editing mode. 'Text to Image' completely replaces the selected image section with new content, 'Image to Image' creates altered versions of the image selection, and 'Inpaint' works like 'Image to Image' except that it only affects areas selected by the mask tool

masked_content.label: Masked content:
masked_content.description: Determines what should be used to fill the masked area before inpainting. 'fill' replaces it with a solid color, 'original' keeps it as-is, 'latent noise' replaces it with random data, and 'latent nothing' clears it. Unless you're inpainting with a denoising strength >0.8, 'original' will almost always be the best option

sampling_steps.label: Sampling steps:
sampling_steps.description: Number of diffusion operations to perform when generating image data. Higher values take longer, but often produce more detailed and accurate results. Different stable-diffusion models and samplers have different requirements, but in most cates setting this higher than 30 has only minimal benefits

denoising_strength.label: Denoising strength:
denoising_strength.description: Controls how dramatically inpainting and image-to-image operations will change the initial image data. At 0.0, the image will be completely unedited, at 1.0 the image will be completely different

sampling_method.label: Sampling method:
sampling_method.description: Mathematical technique used to transform image data during the generation process. 'Euler a' works well in most cases, but certain models or extensions might perform better with other options.

scheduler.label: Scheduler:
scheduler.description: Algorithm used to divide  the image generation process into steps.

upscale_method.label: Upscale method:
upscale_method.description: Method to use when increasing image resolution. Available options will be loaded from the active image generator.

image_layer_scaling_behavior.label: Image scaling behavior:
image_layer_scaling_behavior.description: Controls how multi-layer images are scaled.

canvas_resize_layer_mode.label: Layer expand mode:
canvas_resize_layer_mode.description: Sets which layers should be expanded to fill the image when resized

canvas_resize_crop_layers.label: Crop layers to new image bounds
canvas_resize_crop_layers.description: Sets whether layers should be cropped to image bounds when the image is resized.

seed.label: Seed:
seed.description: Number used to control pseudo-random aspects of image generation, in most cases using the same seed with the same settings and inputs will always produce the same results. If set to -1, a different random seed will be used for each image generation.

last_seed.label: Last seed:
last_seed.description: Last seed used for image generation

inpaint_options_available.label: Inpaint options available
inpaint_options_available.description: Whether the "inpaint full resolution" and "inpaint full resolution padding" features are available.

inpaint_full_res.label: Inpaint Full Resolution
inpaint_full_res.description: If true, inpaint the masked area at higher resolution by ignoring the unmasked area. This can increase image quality by sacrificing awareness of additional image content.

inpaint_full_res_padding.label: Padding:
inpaint_full_res_padding.description: Pixel radius outside of the masked area to include when inpainting when the 'Inpaint Full Resolution' option is enabled. Higher values increase contextual awareness while decreasing overall level of detail.

styles.label: styles
styles.description: Saved style prompts loaded from the webui

lora_models.label: LoRA models:
lora_models.description: LoRA extension model options loaded from the image generator.

hypernetwork_models.label: Hypernetwork models:
hypernetwork_models.description: Hypernetwork extension model options loaded from the image generator.

scripts_txt2img.label: Text to image scripts:
scripts_txt2img.description: Available text-to-image scripts loaded from the webui

scripts_img2img.label: Image to image scripts:
scripts_img2img.description: Available image-to-image scripts loaded from the webui

cutn.label: Detail reference count (cutn):
cutn.description: Determines how many random cutouts from the input image are used to guide image generation (GLID-3-XL). Higher values can introduce more detail and variation, but may also introduce more noise and irrelevant information.

skip_steps.label: Skip steps:
skip_steps.description: Number of diffusion steps to skip (GLID-3-XL). Higher values will result in faster image generation with decreased detail and accuracy.

sd_webui_server_url.label: Stable-Diffusion WebUI server URL:
sd_webui_server_url.description: Cached URL for the Stable-Diffusion WebUI image generation server.

sd_comfyui_server_url.label: Stable-Diffusion ComfyUI server URL:
sd_comfyui_server_url.description: Cached URL for the Stable-Diffusion ComfyUI image generation server.

glid_server_url.label: GLID-3-XL server URL:
glid_server_url.description: Cached URL for the GLID-3-XL image generation server.

sd_model.label: Stable-Diffusion model:
sd_model.description: Stable-Diffusion model to use for image generation.

clip_skip.label: CLIP skip:
clip_skip.description: Number of final image generation steps to take without the prompt applied.  Usually best left at one, but some models produce better results at two.

controlnet_upscaling_available.label: ControlNet upscaling available
controlnet_upscaling_available.description: Whether the active image generator was able to find the necessary components for ControlNet tiled upscaling

controlnet_upscaling.label: ControlNet tiled upscaling
controlnet_upscaling.description: Whether to use the ControlNet tile model to improve image upscaling. When enabled and supported, all other image generation options will influence upscaling results. To use this, the ControlNet extension needs to be installed in the stable-diffusion-webui, and the controlnet tile model needs to be downloaded to the correct folder.

controlnet_downsample_rate.label: Tile downsample rate:
controlnet_downsample_rate.description: Adjusts how strongly the ControlNet tile model preserves the original image data, higher values result in fewer changes.

controlnet_args_0_webui.label: ControlNet Settings (first layer, WebUI API)
controlnet_args_0_webui.description: WebUI API first layer ControlNet extension settings.

controlnet_args_1_webui.label: ControlNet Settings (second layer, WebUI API)
controlnet_args_1_webui.description: WebUI API second layer ControlNet extension settings.

controlnet_args_2_webui.label: ControlNet Settings (third layer, ComfyUI API)
controlnet_args_2_webui.description: ComfyUI API third layer ControlNet extension settings.

controlnet_args_0_comfyui.label: ControlNet Settings (first layer, ComfyUI API)
controlnet_args_0_comfyui.description: ComfyUI API first layer ControlNet extension settings.

controlnet_args_1_comfyui.label: ControlNet Settings (second layer, ComfyUI API)
controlnet_args_1_comfyui.description: ComfyUI API second layer ControlNet extension settings.

controlnet_args_2_comfyui.label: ControlNet Settings (third layer, WebUI API)
controlnet_args_2_comfyui.description: ComfyUI API third layer ControlNet extension settings.

expect_tablet_input.label: Expect tablet input
expect_tablet_input.description: Whether input controls relevant to drawing tablets should be shown immediately, or only after tablet input arrives.

comfyui_model_config.label: Model config:
comfyui_model_config.description: Configuration file used when loading image generation models.

comfyui_inpainting_model.label: Load checkpoint as inpainting model
comfyui_inpainting_model.description: Load the selected Stable-Diffusion model as an inpainting model.

comfyui_tiled_vae.label: Use tiled VAE image encoding
comfyui_tiled_vae.description: Encode and decode latent images in tiled blocks, decreasing GPU memory use.

comfyui_tiled_vae_tile_size.label: VAE tile size:
comfyui_tiled_vae_tile_size.description: Tile size when using tiled VAE encoding/decoding.  Smaller values decrease memory further, but may increase generation time..

webui_tiling.label: Tiling
webui_tiling.description: Generate tiling images that can be seamlessly repeated.

webui_restore_faces.label: Restore faces
webui_restore_faces.description: Use a face restoration model to correct image data after stable-diffusion runs. In most cases you'll probably get better results without it.

webui_subseed.label: Variation seed:
webui_subseed.description: Controls randomness across imagees generated in the same batch.

webui_last_subseed.label: Last variation seed:
webui_last_subseed.description: Last variation seed used for image generation

webui_subseed_strength.label: Variation strength:
webui_subseed_strength.description: Controls the amount of variation within images in the same batch. Lower values will have less variation. If set to zero, this setting is ignored.

webui_seed_resize_enabled.label: Resize seed from alternate resolution
webui_seed_resize_enabled.description: If enabled, reusing the same seed value will produce a similar image even if the resolution changes.

webui_seed_resize.label: Resize from resolution:
webui_seed_resize.description: Generated images using the same seed will match images created at this resolution, regardless of generation size.
